name: Create Revolut draft payments to employees from a Toggl report and send a Slack notification
description:
Create Revolut Business draft payments to your employees from a Toggl time-tracking summary report and send a Slack notification. The scenario is set to run on the first day of the month (you can change it by clicking on the watch icon next to the first module) and it retrieves a summary report for the last month.

The setup of the template assumes you have your employee data stored in an Airtable table. Your table has to include these fields: Name of the employee (First name and Last name) and payment details.

To see which details are required to create a Revolut draft payment depending on the country, click [here](https://developer.revolut.com/docs/build-banking-apps/#tutorials-tutorials-work-with-draft-payments-international-payments). For example, if you're creating a payment to the United Kingdom, your Airtable table needs to include an Account Number and a Sort Code; for payment to Germany, it's IBAN and BIC.
